name: Curved Walnut Dining Chair - Leather
description: This chair is all about the silhouette. The chair's tripod design features a seamlessly curved wooden frame in a Walnut hue. Lightness is incorporated at the back where the chair's two sweeping sections meet, a subtle gap exposes the craftsmanship. The fixed seat is upholstered in an intricately grained black leather, the natural fabric is strong and durable, yet super soft. A statement dining chair. Showstopping elegance.
